template.name: BindMember
template.description: A template for plBindApi BindMember attribute (Long call)
template.author: Paolo Morandotti

point.name: BindingEnabled
point.hint: Boolean: True if that binding is enabled

point.name: SourceMemberFullName
point.hint: String: The full name of the source member (like myComponent.Property)

point.name: TargetMemberFullName
point.hint: String: The full name of the target member (like targetComponent.Property)

point.name: FunctionName
point.hint: String: The name of a bridge function. Optional.

point.name: TargetClassName
point.hint: String: The name of the class containing the target method. Optional.
